intro: Realistic watercraft boat parking simulator - test your ship mooring skills in dangerous conditions!
description:
In the game, you will have to manage various ships, trying to moor them in the designated places, avoiding many obstacles and not damaging your magnificent vessel in a limited time.

REALISTIC PHYSICS
Feel what it is like to manage a yacht! The game offers realistic controls and physics, thanks to which every maneuver requires attention and precision.

DIVERSE LEVELS
With each new level, the difficulty increases! At first, you will encounter simple berths, but as you progress, moving barges, platforms and other obstacles will appear on your way, making parking a real challenge.

MARINE ATMOSPHERE
Enjoy picturesque coastlines, coastal areas and the serene atmosphere of the sea. Visual effects and sound accompaniment immerse you in the world of yachting adventures.

DIFFERENT TYPES OF BOATS
Discover different types of yachts and boats, each with its own characteristics and control features. Make your choice depending on the level and the tasks you have to complete.

Are you ready to become a master of yacht parking? Show everyone that you are a true captain of the ship!
